title: Clown's Collection of SCP Haiku
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

> where are my people?
> our rusted monuments are
> gone, without a trace.

> lady in the glass,
> close enough for me to touch,
> yet so far from me.

> in my memories,
> you are always full. what changed?
> why are you empty?

> oh, bright and low moon,
> why have you forsaken me?
> i must have your light.

> the buildings fall down,
> then back up again. my mind
> breaks, lost forever.

> wherever i am
> in these sterile halls, your fur
> makes me think of home.

> old book, lost to time,
> what secrets do you contain?
> i have to, must know.

> tree i always see,
> salt stretching out forever,
> my eyes start to close.

> through the cold concrete,
> wherever we are sent to,
> the window shows green.

> you buried me here,
> and now you want to return?
> the locusts emerge.

author: UncannyClown276
